name: Train Your Minibot (itch)
description:
Meet Minibot.

This lil' guy is about the size of your thumb but boy can he fly.

The rules:

1. Build a path across your bedroom for your Minibot to conquer.

2. Soar through the air with your rocket booster (aided by the power of soda.)

3. Learn each levels' mechanics, alter your route accordingly, and victory will be yours.

 

Train Your Minibot was created for the GDL Anniversary Jam.
